analyzed: śrīḥ
prathamaḥ dhyāyaḥ
sukha santāna siddhi artham natvā brahmā cyutā arcitam
veda artha śaiva śāstra jñaḥ pavi ekaḥ bhūt loka śaṅkaram

original: tasya putro 'sti kedāraḥ śivapādārcane rataḥ // KedV_1.2 //
analyzed: tasya putraḥ sti kedāraḥ śiva pāda arcane rataḥ
tena idam kriyate chandaḥ lakṣya lakṣaṇa saṃyutam
vṛtta ratnākaram nāma bālānām sukha siddhye
piṅgala ādi bhra ācāryaiḥ yat uktam laukikam dvidhā
mātrā varṇa vibhedena chandaḥ tat iha kathyate
ṣaṣ adhyāya nibaddhasya chandasaḥ sya parisphuṭam
pramāṇam api vijñeyam ṣaḍtriṃśat adhikam śatam
mya ra sta ja bhna gaiḥ la antaiḥ ebhiḥ daśabhiḥ akṣaraiḥ

original: samastaṃ vāṅmayaṃ vyāptaṃ trailokyamiva viṣṇunā // KedV_1.6 //
analyzed: samastam vāc mayam vyāptam trailokyam iva viṣṇunā
sarva gurmaḥ mukha antar lau ya rau antagalau satau

original: gmadhyādyau jmau trilo no 'ṣṭau bhavantyatra gaṇāstrikāḥ // KedV_1.7 //
analyzed: gm adhi ādyau trilaḥ no ṣṭau bhavanti atra gaṇāḥ trikāḥ
jñeyāḥ sarva anta madhya ādi guravaḥ catuṣkalāḥ
gaṇāḥ catur laghu upetāḥ pañca ārya ādiṣu saṃsthitāḥ
sa anusvāraḥ visarga antaḥ dīrghaḥ yukta paraḥ ca yaḥ

original: vā pādānte tvasau gvakro jñeyo 'nyo mātriko lṛjuḥ // KedV_1.9 //
analyzed: vā pāda ante tu asau gvakraḥ jñeyaḥ nyaḥ mātrikaḥ lṛjuḥ
pāda ādau iha varṇasya saṃyogaḥ krama saṃjñakaḥ

original: puraḥsthitena tena syāllaghutā 'pi kvacid guroḥ // KedV_1.10 //
analyzed: puras sthitena tena syāt laghu tā kvacid guroḥ

original: taruṇaṃ sarṣapaśākaṃ navaudanaṃ picchilāni ca dadhīni /
analyzed: taruṇam sarṣapa śākam nava odanam picchilāni ca dadhīni
alpa vyayena sundari
grāmya janaḥ miṣṭam iśnāti
abdhi bhūta rasa ādīnām jñeyāḥ saṃjñāḥ tu lokataḥ
jñeyaḥ pādaḥ caturtha āśaḥ yatiḥ viccheda saṃjñitaḥ
sadbhiḥ nigadyate

original: samamardhasamaṃ vṛttaṃ viṣamaṃ ca tathāparam // KedV_1.13 //
analyzed: samam ardhasamam vṛttam viṣamam ca tathā aparam
aṅghrayaḥ yasya catvāraḥ tulya lakṣaṇa lakṣitāḥ
tat chandaḥ śāstra tattva jñāḥ samam vṛttam pracakṣate
prathama aṅghri samaḥ yasya tṛtīyaḥ caraṇaḥ bhavet
dvitīyaḥ turya vat vṛttam tad ardha samam ucyate
yasya pāda catuṣke pi lakṣma bhinnam parasparam
tat āhuḥ viṣamam vṛttam chandaḥ śāstra viśāradāḥ
ārabhya eka akṣārāt pādāt eka eka kṣara vat hitaiḥ
pṛthak chandaḥ bhavet pādaiḥ yāvat ṣaḍviṃśatim gatam
tad ūrdhvam caṇḍa vṛṣṭi ādi daṇḍakāḥ parikīrtitāḥ
śeṣam gāthāḥ tribhiḥ ṣaḍbhiḥ caraṇaiḥ ca upalakṣitāḥ
uktā tyuktā tathā madhyā pratiṣṭhā nyā supūrvikā

original: gāyatryuṣṇiganuṣṭup ca bṛhatī paṅktireva ca // KedV_1.19 //
analyzed: gāyatrī uṣṇih anuṣṭubh ca bṛhatī paṅktiḥ eva ca

original: triṣṭup ca jagatī caiva tathā 'tijagatī matā /
analyzed: triṣṭubh ca jagatī ca eva tathā tijagatī matā

original: śakvarī sā 'tipūrvā syādaṣṭyatyaṣṭī tataḥ smṛte // KedV_1.20 //
analyzed: śakvarī sā ti pūrvā syāt aṣṭi atyaṣṭī tatas smṛte
dhṛtiḥ ca a tidhṛtiḥ ca eva krṭiḥ prakṛtiḥ ākṛtiḥ
vikṛtiḥ saṅkṛtiḥ ca eva tathā tikṛtiḥ utkṛtiḥ
iti uktāḥ chandasām saṃjñāḥ kramatas vacmi sāmpratam
lakṣaṇam sarva vṛttānām mātrā vṛttāḥ anupūrvakam

original: iti śrīkedārabhaṭṭaviracite vṛttaratnākare saṃjñābhidhāno nāma prathamo 'dhyāyaḥ / @---------------------
analyzed: iti śrī kedārabhaṭṭa viracite vṛttaratnākare saṃjñābhidhānaḥ nāma prathamaḥ dhyāyaḥ
dvitīyaḥ dhyāyaḥ
āryā prakaraṇam

original: lakṣmaitatsapta gaṇā gopetā bhavati neha viṣame jaḥ /
analyzed: lakṣma etat sapta gaṇāḥ gopetā bhavati na iha viṣame jaḥ

original: ṣaṣṭho 'yaṃ nalaghū vā prathame 'rdhe niyatamāryāyāḥ // KedV_2.1 //
analyzed: ṣaṣṭhaḥ yam na laghū vā prathame rdhe niyatam āryāyāḥ
ṣaṣthe dvitīya lāt parake n le mukha lāt ca sa yati pada niyamaḥ

original: carame 'rdhe pañcake tasmādiha bhavati ṣaṣṭho laḥ // KedV_2.2 //
analyzed: carame rdhe pañcake tasmāt iha bhavati ṣaṣṭhaḥ laḥ
triṣu aṅkeṣu pādaḥ dalayoḥ ādyeṣu dṛśyate yasyāḥ

original: pathyeti nāma tasyāḥ prakīrtitaṃ nāgarājena // KedV_2.3 //
analyzed: pathyā iti nāma tasyāḥ prakīrtitam nāga rājena
saṃlaṅghya gaṇa trayam ādimam śakalayoḥ dvayoḥ bhavati pādaḥ
sam anunāsika laṅghya
yasyāḥ tām piṅgala nāgaḥ vipulām iti samākhyāti
ubhaya ardhayoḥ jakārau dvitīya turyau ga madhya gau tasyāḥ

original: capaleti nāma tasyā prakīrtitaṃ nāgarājena // KedV_2.5 //
analyzed: capalā iti nāma tasyāḥ prakīrtitam nāga rājena

original: ādyaṃ dalaṃ samastaṃ bhajeya lakṣma capalāgataṃ yasyāḥ /
analyzed: ādyam dalam samastam bhajeya lakṣma capala āgatam yasyāḥ
śeṣe pūrva ja lakṣmā mukha capala āsa uditā muninā
prāc pratipāditam ardhe prathame prathama itare ca capalāyāḥ
lakṣmā āśrayate sā uktā viśuddha dhībhiḥ jaghana capalā
gīti prakaraṇam
ārya aorathama dala uktam yadi katham api lakṣaṇam bhavet ubhayoḥ

original: dalayoḥ krṭayatiśobhāṃ tāṃ gītiṃ gītavānbhujaṅgeśaḥ // KedV_2.8 //
analyzed: dalayoḥ tām gītim gītavān bhujaṅga īśaḥ
āryā dvitīyake ṛdhe yat gaditam lakṣaṇam tat syāt
yadi ubhayoḥ api dalayoḥ upagītim tāḥ muniḥ brūte
āryā śakala dvitayam vyatyaya racitam bhavet yasyāḥ
sā udgītiḥ kila gaditā tadvat yati aṃśa bheda saṃyuktā
āryā pūrva ardham yadi guruṇā ekena adhikena nidhane yuktam
itarat tadvat nikhilam bhavati yadi iyam arddha mudita āryā gītiḥ
vaitālīya prakaraṇam

original: ṣaḍviṣame 'ṣṭau same kalāstāśca same syurno nirantarāḥ /
analyzed: ṣaṣ viṣame ṣṭau same kalāḥ tāḥ ca same syuḥ no nirantarāḥ

original: na samātra parāśritā kalā vaitālīye 'nte ralā guruḥ // KedV_2.12 //
analyzed: na samātra parāśritā kalā vaitālīye nte ralā guruḥ

original: paryante ryau tathaiva śeṣamaupacchandasikaṃ sudhībhiruktam // KedV_2.13 //
analyzed: paryante ryau tathā eva śeṣam aupacchandasikam sudhībhiḥ uktam
āpātalikā kathitā iyam bhādgurukau atha pūrvavat anyat
tṛtīya yuj dakṣiṇa antikā samasta pādeṣu dvitīya laḥ
udīcya vṛttiḥ dvitīya laḥ saktaḥ greṇa bhavet ayugmayoḥ

original: pūrveṇa yuto 'tha pañcamaḥ prācyavṛttiruditeti yugmayoḥ // KedV_2.17 //
analyzed: pūrveṇa pañcamaḥ prācya vṛttiḥ uditā iti yugmayoḥ
yadā samā voja yugmakau pūrvayoḥ bhavati tat pravṛttakam
asya yugma racitā parāntikā
ayuj bhavā cāru hāsinī
vaktra prakaraṇam
vaktram na adyāt na asau syātām abdheḥ yaḥ nuṣṭubhi khyātam

ojayā ūrjena vāridheḥ tat eva viparīta ādi

original: yasyā laḥ saptamo yugme sā yugmavipulā matā // KedV_2.25 //

yat atīta kṛta vividha lakṣma yutaiḥ mātrā sama ādi pādaiḥ kalitam
aniyata vṛtta parimāṇa yuktam prathitam jagatsu pādākulakam

original: vṛttasya lā vinā varṇairgā varṇā gurubhistathā /
analyzed: vṛttasya lā vinā varṇaiḥ gāḥ varṇāḥ gurubhiḥ tathā

original: guruvo lairdale nityaṃ pramāṇamiti niścitam // KedV_2.38 //
analyzed: nityam pramāṇam iti niścitam
śikhi guṇita daśa laghu racitam apagata laghu yugalam aparam idam akhilam

original: saguru śakalayugalakamapi suparighaṭitalalitapadavitati bhavati śikhā // KedV_2.39 //
analyzed: sa guru śakala yugalakam api su parighaṭita lalita pada vitati bhavati śikhā

original: śrutisukhakṛdiyamapi jagati ñi jaśira upagatavati sati bhavati khajā // KedV_2.40 //
analyzed: śruti sukha kṛt iyam api jagati upagatavati sati bhavati kha jā

original: dalamaparamapi vasuguṇitasalilanidhilaghu kaviracitaṃ padavitati bhavati // KedV_2.41 //
analyzed: dalam aparam api vasu guṇita salilanidhi laghu kavi racitam pada vitati bhavati

rjau samānikā galau ca

original: syādindravajrā yadi tau jagau gaḥ // KedV_3.28 //

original: vātormīyaṃ kathitā mbhau tagau gaḥ // KedV_3.35 //
analyzed: vātormīyam kathitā m bhau ta gau gaḥ

original: mbhau nlau gaḥ syād bhramaravilasitam // KedV_3.37 //
analyzed: m bhau n lau gaḥ syāt bhramara vilasitam

na na ra la guru racitā vṛntā
nanaram agurubhiḥ ca bhadrikā
śyenikā ra jau ra lau guruḥ padā

candra vartma nigadanti ra nabhasaiḥ
jatau tu vaṃśa stham udīritam jarau

raiḥ caturbhiḥ yutā sragviṇī sammatā

original: tyau tyau maṇimālā cchinnā guhavaktraiḥ // KedV_3.58 //
analyzed: tyau tyau maṇimālā chinnā guha vaktraiḥ
lalitā ta bhaujarau

na na bha ra sahitā ma hita ujjvalā

abhinava tāmarasam

catur grahaiḥ ati rucirāḥ jabhasjagāḥ
vedaiḥ randhraiḥ mtau yasagāḥ matta mayūram

original: ( upasthitamidaṃ jsau tsau sagurukaṃ cet ) // KedV_3.73 //
analyzed: upasthitam idam jsau tsau sa gurukam ced
sajasā jagau bhavati mañju bhāṣiṇī
nanata ta gurubhiḥ candrikā aśva ṛtubhiḥ
mtau nsau gāvakṣa graha virati sambādhā
na na ra sa laghu gaiḥ svaraiḥ aparājitā
na nabhana laghu gaiḥ praharaṇa kalitā

original: uktā vasantatilakā tabhajā jagau gaḥ // KedV_3.79 //
analyzed: uktā vasantatilakā ta bha jā jagau gaḥ
siṃha unnatā iyam uditā muni kāśyapena
uddharṣiṇīya muditā muni saitavena
indu vadanā bhaja sanaiḥ sa guru yugmaiḥ

original: dviḥsaptacchidalolā msau mbhau gau caraṇe cet // KedV_3.83 //
analyzed: dvis sapta chida lolāḥ m sau m bhau gau caraṇe ced
dvi hata haya laghu ratha g iti śaśi kalā
sraj iti bhavati rasa navaka yatiḥ iyam
vasu haya yatiḥ iha maṇi guṇa nikaraḥ
mālinī bhogi lokaiḥ

original: bhavati najau bhajau rasahitau prabhadrakam // KedV_3.88 //
analyzed: bhavati na jau bha jau rasa hitau prabhadrakam

original: mrau myau yāntau bhavetāṃ saptāṣṭabhiścandralekhā // KedV_3.90 //
analyzed: mrau myau yāntau bhavetām sapta aṣṭabhiḥ candralekhā

original: najabhajaraiḥ sadā bhavati vāṇinī gayuktaiḥ // KedV_3.92 //
analyzed: na ja bha ja raiḥ sadā bhavati vāṇinī ga yuktaiḥ

original: rasai rudraiśchinnā yamanasabhalā gaḥ śikhariṇī // KedV_3.93 //
analyzed: rasaiḥ rudraiḥ chinnā gaḥ śikhariṇī

original: jasau jasayalā vasugrahayatiśca pṛthvī guruḥ // KedV_3.94 //
analyzed: jasau vasu graha yatiḥ ca pṛthvī guruḥ
diś muni vaṃśa patra patitam bhara nabha nala gaiḥ

original: rasayugahayairnsau mrau slau gau yadā hariṇī tadā // KedV_3.96 //
analyzed: rasa yuga hayaiḥ nsau m rau s lau gau yadā hariṇī tadā

original: mandākrāntā jaladhiṣaḍagairmbhaunatau tād guru cet // KedV_3.97 //
analyzed: manda ākrāntāḥ tāt guru ced
haya daśabhiḥ na jau bhaja jalāḥ guru narkuṭakam
muni guha kārṃavaiḥ kṛtayati vada kokilakam

original: syād bhūtartvaśvaiḥ kusumitalatāvellitā mtau nayau yau // KedV_3.100 //
analyzed: syāt bhūta ṛtu aśvaiḥ kusumita latā vellitā m tau na yau yau
sūryāśvaiḥ masajaḥ tatāḥ sa guravaḥ śārdūla vikrīḍitam

original: jñeyā saptāśvaṣaḍbhrmarabhanayayutā bhlo gaḥ suvadanā // KedV_3.102 //
analyzed: jñeyā sapta aśva ṣaṣ bhrma rabha naya yutā bhlaḥ gaḥ su vadanā

original: trī rajau galau bhavedihedṛśena lakṣaṇena vṛttanāma // KedV_3.103 //
analyzed: tris rajau galau bhavet iha īdṛśena lakṣaṇena vṛtta nāma

original: mrabhnairyānāṃ trayeṇa trimuniyatiyutā sragdharā kīrtiteyam // KedV_3.104 //
analyzed: mrabhnaiḥ yānām trayeṇa tri muni yati yutā sragdharā kīrtitā iyam

original: bhrau naranā ranāvatha gururdigarkaviramaṃ hi bhadrakamiti // KedV_3.105 //
analyzed: bhrau na ra nā ra nau atha guruḥ diś arka viramam hi bhadrakam iti

original: yadiha najau bhajau bhjabhalagāstadaśvalalitaṃ harārkayatimam // KedV_3.106 //
analyzed: yat iha na jau bha jau bhja bha lagāḥ tat aśva lalitam

original: matākrīḍā mau tnau nau nalgiti bhavati vasuśaradaśayatiyutā // KedV_3.107 //
analyzed: matā krīḍā mau tnau nau nalgiti bhavati vasu śarad śayati yutā

original: bhūtamuninairyatiriha bhatanāḥ sbhau bhanayāśca yadi bhavati tanvī // KedV_3.108 //
analyzed: bhūta muni nairyatiḥ iha bha tanāḥ s bhau bha na yāḥ ca yadi bhavati tanvī

original: krauñjapadā bhamau smau nananā ngāviṣaśaravasumuniviratiriha bhavet // KedV_3.109 //
analyzed: krauñjapadāḥ bhamau smau nananāḥ ngā viṣa śara vasu muni viratiḥ iha bhavet
vasvī īśā aśva cheda upetam mamatana yuga nara sa lagaiḥ bhujaṅga vijṛmbhitam

original: mo nāḥ ṣaṭ sagagiti yadi navarasarasaśarayatiyutamapavāhākhyam // KedV_3.111 //
analyzed: maḥ nāḥ ṣaṭ sa gak iti yadi nava rasa rasa śara yati yutam apavāha ākhyam

original: yadi ha nayugalaṃ tataḥ saptarephā stadā caṇḍavṛṣṭiprapāto bhaveddaṇḍakaḥ // KedV_3.112 //
analyzed: yadi ha na yugalam tatas sapta rephāḥ tadā caṇḍa vṛṣṭi prapātaḥ bhavet daṇḍakaḥ
praticaraṇa vivṛddha rephāḥ

original: pracitakasamabhidho dhīradhībhiḥ smṛtodaṇḍako nadvayāduttaraiḥ saptabhiryaiḥ // KedV_3.114 //
analyzed: pracitaka samabhidhaḥ dhīra dhībhiḥ smṛtaḥ daṇḍakaḥ na dvayāt uttaraiḥ saptabhiḥ yaiḥ
iti śrīmat bhaṭṭa rāmeśvara sūnu nārāyaṇa bhaṭṭa viracitāyām
vṛtta ratnākara vyākhyāyām samavṛtta adhyāyaḥ tṛtīyaḥ
caturthaḥ dhyāyaḥ

original: viṣame yadi sau salagā dale bhau yuji bhād gurukāvupacitram // KedV_4.1 //
analyzed: viṣame yadi sau sa la gāḥ dale bhau yuji bhāt gurukau upacitram

original: bhatrayamojagataṃ guruṇī cedyuji ca najau jyayutā drutamadhyā // KedV_4.2 //
analyzed: bha trayam oja gatam guruṇī ced yuji ca na jau jyā yutā druta madhyā

original: sayugātsagurū viṣame cedbhāviha vegavatī yuji bhādgau // KedV_4.3 //
analyzed: sa yugāt sa gurū viṣame ced bhau iha vegavatī yuji bhāt gau

original: oje taparau jarau guruścenmasau jgaugbhadravirāṅ bhavedanoje // KedV_4.4 //
analyzed: oje ta parau jarau guruḥ ced ma sau bhavet an oje

original: asame sajo saguruyuktau ketumatī same bharanagādgaḥ // KedV_4.5 //
analyzed: asame sa jaḥ sa guru yuktau ketumatī same bhara nagāt gaḥ

original: ākhyānakīṃ tau jagurū ga oje jatāvanoje jagurū guruścet // KedV_4.6 //
analyzed: ākhyānakīm tau jagurū gaḥ oje jatau anoje jagurū guruḥ ced

original: jatau jagau go viṣame same cettau jgau ga eṣā viparītapūrvā // KedV_4.7 //
analyzed: viṣame same ced tau jgau ga eṣā viparīta pūrvā

original: sayugātsalaghū viṣame gururyuji nabhau bharakau hariṇaplutā // KedV_4.8 //
analyzed: sa yugāt sa laghū viṣame guruḥ yuji nabhau bharakau hariṇa plutā

original: ayuji nanaralā guruḥ samenjamaparavaktramidaṃ tato jarau // KedV_4.9 //
analyzed: ayuji guruḥ sama injam apara vaktram idam tatas jarau

original: ayuji nayugarephato yakāro yuji ca najau jaragāśca puṣpitāgrā // KedV_4.10 //
analyzed: a yuji na yuga rephataḥ yakāraḥ yuji ca na jau ja ra gāḥ ca puṣpita agrā
vadanti aparavaktra ākhyam vaitālīyam vipaścitaḥ
puṣpa tā agra abhidham kecid aupacchandasikam tathā

original: syāayugmake rajau rayau same cejjarau jarau gururyavātparā matīyam // KedV_4.12 //
analyzed: syā ayugmake rajau rayau same ced jarau jarau guruḥ yavāt parā matī iyam
iti śrīmat bhaṭṭa rāmeśvara sūnu nārāyaṇa bhaṭṭa viracitāyām
vṛttaratnākara vyākhyāyām ardhasamādhyāyaḥ caturthaḥ
pañcamaḥ dhyāyaḥ
pada catur ūrdhva prakaraṇam
mukhavādaḥ ṣṭabhiḥ varṇaiḥ pare syuḥ makara ālayaiḥ kramāt vṛddhaiḥ
satatam yasya vicitraiḥ pādaiḥ sampanna saundaryam
tat uditam amala matibhiḥ pada catur ūrdhva abhidham vṛttam
prathamam udita vṛtte viracita viṣama caraṇa bhāji
guruka yugala nidhane iha sahitaḥ āṅā
laghu virata pada vitati yatiḥ iti bhavati pīḍaḥ
prathamam itara caraṇa samuttham śrayati sa yadi lakṣma
itarat itara gati tam api yadi ca turyam
caraṇa yugalakam iti kalikā sā
dvi guru yuta sa mala caraṇa antā mukha caraṇa gatam anubhavati ca tṛtīyaḥ

original: aparamiha lakṣma prakṛtamakhilamapi yadidamanubhavati lavalī sā // KedV_5.4 //
analyzed: aparam iha lakṣma prakṛtam akhilam api yat idam anubhavati lavalī sā
pratham adhivasati yadi turyam
carama caraṇa padam avasita guru yugmam
nikhilam aparam upari gatam iti lalita pada yuktā
tat idam amṛta dhārā
udgatā prakaraṇam
saja ādime sa laghukau ca na saja gurukaiḥ atha udgatā

original: tryaṅghrigatabhanajalā gayutāḥ sajasā agau caraṇamekataḥ paṭhet // KedV_5.6 //
analyzed: tri aṅghri gata bha na jalāḥ ga yutāḥ sa jasāḥ a gau caraṇam ekatas paṭhet
caraṇa trayam vrajati lakṣma yadi sakalam udgata āgatam

original: nā bhagau bhavati saurabhakaṃ caraṇe yadīha bhavatastṛtīyake // KedV_5.7 //
analyzed: nā bha gau bhavati saurabhakam caraṇe yadi iha bhavataḥ tṛtīyake

original: nayugaṃ sakārayugalaṃ ca bhavati caraṇe tṛtīyake /
analyzed: na yugam sakāra yugalam ca bhavati caraṇe tṛtīyake

original: taduditamurumatibhirlalitaṃ yadi śeṣamasya khalu pūrvatulyakam // KedV_5.8 //
analyzed: tat uditam uru matibhiḥ lalitam yadi śeṣam asya khalu pūrva tulyakam
upasthita pracupita prakaraṇam

original: msau jbhau gau prathamāṅghrirekataḥ pṛthaganyattritayaṃ sanajaragāstato nanau saḥ /
analyzed: m sau j bhau gau prathama aṅghriḥ ekatas pṛthak anyat tritayam sa na ja ra gāḥ tatas na nau saḥ
trina parikalita jayau pracupitam idam uditam upasthita pūrvam

original: nau pāde 'tha tṛtīyake sanau nasayuktau prathamāṅghrikṛtayatistu vardhamānam /
analyzed: nau pāde tha tṛtīyake sa nau na sa yuktau prathama aṅghri kṛta yatiḥ tu vardhamānam

original: tritayamaparamapi pūrvasadṛśamiha bhavati pratatamatibhiriti gaditaṃ laghu vṛttam // KedV_5.10 //
analyzed: tritayam aparam api pūrva sadṛśam iha bhavati pratata matibhiḥ iti gaditam laghu vṛttam
prathame ca viratiḥ ārṣabham bruvanti

original: tacchuddhavirāṭ puraḥ sthitaṃ tritayamaparamapi yadi pūrvasamaṃ syāt // KedV_5.11 //
analyzed: tat śuddha virāj puras sthitam tritayam aparam api yadi pūrva samam syāt
viṣama akṣara pādam vā pādaiḥ asamam daśa dhrmavat

original: yacchando noktamatra gātheti tatsūribhiḥ proktam // KedV_5.12 //
analyzed: yat chandaḥ na uktam atra gāthā iti tat sūribhiḥ proktam
iti śrīmat bhaṭṭa rāmeśvara sūnu nārāyaṇa bhaṭṭa viracitāyām vṛttaratnākara vyākhyāyām
pañcamaḥ dhyāyaḥ
ṣaṣṭhaḥ dhyāyaḥ
prastāraḥ
prastāraḥ naṣṭam uddiṣṭam eka dvaya ādi laga kriyā
saṅkhyānam adhu ayogaḥ ca ṣaṭ ete pratyayāḥ smṛtāḥ
pāde sarva gurau ādyān laghum nyasya guroḥ adhas

original: yathopari tathā śeṣaṃ bhūyaḥ kuryādamuṃ vidhim // KedV_6.2 //
analyzed: yathā upari tathā śeṣam bhūyas kuryāt amum vidhim
ūne dadyāt gurūn eva yāvat sarva laghuḥ bhavet
prastāraḥ yam samākhyātaḥ chandaḥ viciti vedibhiḥ
naṣṭam

original: naṣṭasya yo bhavedaṅkastasyārdhe 'rdhe same ca laḥ //
analyzed: naṣṭasya yaḥ bhavet aṅkaḥ tasya ardhe rdhe same ca laḥ
viṣame ca ekam ādhāya syāt ardhe rdhe guru bhavet
uddiṣṭam
uddiṣṭam dviguṇān ādyāt upari aṅkān samālikhet

original: laghusthā ye ca tatrāṅkāstaiḥ saikairmiśritairbhavet // KedV_6.5 //
analyzed: laghu sthāḥ ye ca tatra aṅkāḥ taiḥ sa ekaiḥ miśritaiḥ bhavet
eka dvaya ādi laga kriyā
varṇān vṛtta bhavān sa ekān auttara adharyataḥ sthitān
eka ādi kramataḥ ca etān upari upari nikṣipet
upāntyataḥ nivarteta tyajan ekaikam ūrdhvatas
upari ādyāt guroḥ ekam eka dvi ādi laga kriyā
saṅkhyānam
laga kriyā aṅka sandohe bhavet saṅkhyā vimiśrite
uddiṣṭa aṅka samāhāraḥ sā ekā vā janayet imām
adhva yogaḥ
saṅkhyā eva dviguṇā eka ūnā sadbhiḥ adhvā prakīrtitaḥ
vṛttasya aṅgulikā vyāptiḥ adhas kuryāt tathā aṅgulim
vaṃśe bhūt kaśyapasya prakaṭa guṇa gaṇaḥ śaiva siddhānta vettā
vipraḥ pavi eka nāmā vimalatara matiḥ veda tattva artha bodhe
kedāraḥ tasya sūnuḥ śiva caraṇa yuga ārādhana ekāgra cittaḥ chandaḥ tena abhirāmam
vṛttaratnākara ākhyam
iti śrīmat bhaṭṭa rāmeśvara sūnu nārāyaṇa bhaṭṭa viracitāyām vṛttaratnākara vyākhyāyām
prastāra adhyāyaḥ ṣaṣṭhaḥ samāptaḥ
